snippet.title: Wind Runners | Latin American Games Showcase TGA 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wind Runners
For generations, the Zarah Igna system has been ruled by the Iron Fist of the Kingdom, a brutal force that rules by fear and unstoppable military might. But hope flies with the Wind Runners, an elite group of rebel Ishma pilots with unparalleled aerial combat skills. In their hands, freedom is more than a dream, it's a mission.
Take control of one of seven available ships, each equipped with unique weapons and abilities, and master the art of aerial combat in this roguelike side-scroller. Evolve your capital ship to equip powerful upgrades and battle the Saints: Generals and pilots of the Cardinal Beasts, colossal mechanical war machines that dominate distant planets.
Wind Runners delivers intense, fast-paced, action-packed gameplay for thrill-seekers who crave skill-based combat and addictive progression. Victory is never guaranteed, but each match brings you closer to breaking the chains of oppression and bringing hope to the galaxy.
So get ready! It's time to take back the skies.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo/ここで購入:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101370/Wind_Runners/
